text:
Lead Ruby on Rails Engineer | San Francisco, CA | Full-time only | 120k-140k, 1-2% equity | https://onboardiq.com/

OnboardIQ (YC S15) is a hiring automation platform for companies employing hourly workers — customers like Munchery, Sprig, Caviar, Shyp, and ZIRX use our software to vet and onboard 100% of their hourly workforce. What we build fundamentally affects the way people work across the world.

We are a young company backed by some of the Valley’s top investors, including Y Combinator (S15), SoftTech, Crosslink, Slow Ventures, Thiel, and more.

Our MRR has grown 10x in the past 3 months, and we are continuing to grow at a break-neck speed.

If you're excited about being employee #3 at YC-backed startup and building our engineering team, email me at keith@onboardiq.com

https://angel.co/onboardiq

http://jeremycai.com/labor
